titles.title: National Security Rocket Engine Study Act of 2013
A bill to require a study on the Russian RD-180 rocket engine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/12/2013--Introduced. National Security Rocket Engine Study Act of 2013 - Requires the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to submit and the Comptroller General (GAO) to review a report on the Russian RD-180 rocket engine, including: (1) a feasibility assessment and cost estimate of manufacturing an alternative rocket engine in the United States, and (2) a description of policy benefits and concerns related to where the rocket engine is manufactured.
